attributes.action: Tell the electorate just how much in taxpayer pounds you have approved in payments to individuals for keeping quiet about the state of the NHS.
attributes.additional_details: It is at the very least immoral for David Cameron to authorise the use of taxpayer pounds to keep vital information about the state of the NHS from the people who pay for it.  David Cameron is complicit in the facilitation of continuing deaths of individuals in Africa through his refusal to stop foreign aid payments to despots who buy bombs and bullets with our taxpayer pounds and now he personally contributes to the death of patients being treated in NHS hospitals through refusing to stop gagging order payments.  David Cameron needs to be put on trial as an accessory before the fact of mass murder.  If there is a God he soon will be.
